EVALUATION D'UN PROJET DE
            DEVELOPPEMENT DU TOURISME

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed project would be carried
            out from 1975 to 1980 and would consist of: (a) a line of
            credit for CCI to provide long-term loans for the
            construction of new hotels; (b) technical assistance for
            CCI, the executing agency and for the Ministry of Tourism;
            and (c) a marketing study to review the country's
            tourism potential and priority areas for tourism development.
